RESOURCE.NAME: RussIE
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Basic version of the RussIE application

RESOURCE.NAME: RussIE + Inflectional Gazetteer & OrthoMatcher
RESOURCE.COMMENT: RussIE application with orthomatcher and inflexional gazetteer

RESOURCE.NAME: Inflectional gazetteer
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Gazetteer with support for inflectional morphology

PARAMETER.NAME: encoding
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The encoding to use when reading configuration

PARAMETER.NAME: caseSensitive
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Should this gazetteer differentiate on case

PARAMETER.NAME: annotationSetName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to use

PARAMETER.NAME: config
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Location of the configuration file

PARAMETER.NAME: importOnlyTheseTypes
PARAMETER.COMMENT: major types to be imported

PARAMETER.NAME: corpus
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The corpus containing the document to process

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to process

RESOURCE.NAME: Russian Gazetteer
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Customised version of the hash gazetteer

PARAMETER.NAME: encoding
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The encoding used for reading the definitions

PARAMETER.NAME: annotationSetName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used for the generated annotations

PARAMETER.NAME: listsURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL to the file with list of lists

PARAMETER.NAME: corpus
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The corpus containing the document to process

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to process

RESOURCE.NAME: POS Mapper
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Map complex Russian morphology tags into simpler POS categories

PARAMETER.NAME: inputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The name of the annotation set containing MSD and Token annotations

PARAMETER.NAME: corpus
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The corpus containing the document to process

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to process

PARAMETER.NAME: encoding
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The encoding used for reading the config and morphology files

PARAMETER.NAME: caseSensitive
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Should this POS Tagger differentiate on case

PARAMETER.NAME: annotationSetName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set name to use

PARAMETER.NAME: config
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Location of configuration file listing morphology files to be loaded

PARAMETER.NAME: corpus
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The corpus containing the document to process

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to process
